description: Ancient Polynesians explored the entire Pacific on great voyaging canoes built with traditional yet sophisticated techniques. A nod to native exploration and craftsmanship, the rich, premium full-grain leather Mea Ola features canoe lash whipstitching and octopus- inspired laser-etched artwork – a super comfortable sandal with design inspired by age-old tradition.
name: Olukai Mea Ola - Mens
